import React, { Component } from 'react' import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import './Projects.css' class Slideshow extends React.Component { constructor(props, context) { super(props, context) this.handleSelect = this.handleSelect.bind(this); this.state = { index: 0, direction: null, images: [ require("./app-images/breaking-bricks-home.png"), require("./app-images/breaking-bricks-start.png"), require("./app-images/breaking-bricks-win.png"), require("./app-images/breaking-bricks-lose.png"), ] } } handleSelect(selectedIndex, e) { this.setState({ index: selectedIndex, direction: e.direction, }); } render() { const { index, direction, images } = this.state; return (
